name: Cerebellum Turmoil
description:
Twin stick shooter!  You are trying to conquer your emotions (get your mind together) so you become stronger! 

WebGL version seems to work fine. If you have issues, please check out the windows downloadable version!

Controls:

Go to options for sound controls and controller type selection. Supports game pads, or keyboard and mouse! 

Keyboard & Mouse:

Move: Arrow keys or AWSD

Aim: Mouse

Shoot: Left mouse click

Gamepad:

Move: Left joystick

Aim & Shoot: Right joystick

Credits:

Programmer/lead: Seth Funk

Artists: Abox, Shiyi Yin

Music/Sfx: Zensor, Plantpotu
